timeBasedCanary.description: The time based canary configuration information. If `type` is `TimeBasedLinear`, use `time_based_linear` instead.

timeBasedLinear.description: The time based linear configuration information. If `type` is `TimeBasedCanary`, use `time_based_canary` instead.

type.description: Type of traffic routing config. One of `TimeBasedCanary`, `TimeBasedLinear`, `AllAtOnce`.
